content: The Stormflash Loong Staff is a weapon in Black Myth: Wukong. It comes with solid stats, damage, and a unique effect like many of the other Weapons in the game.

The content is as follows:
The Stormflash Loong Staff is a weapon in Black Myth: Wukong. It comes with solid stats, damage, and a unique effect like many of the other Weapons in the game.
